sql-select.name: GetListOfDatabaseTables
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[name] AS [NodeUName] ,tSO.[id] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,CASE WHEN OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 1 THEN N'MSShippedTableIcon' WHEN tSO.[xtype] IN (N'U') THEN N'UserTableIcon' WHEN tSO.[xtype] IN (N'S') THEN N'SystemTableIcon' ELSE N'UnknownTableIcon' END AS [NodeUIcon] ,N'#808080' AS [NodeFontColor] ,N'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSO.[id] AS [ObjectId] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] WHERE tSO.[xtype] = @XTypeId AND tSO.[uid] = @SchemaId GROUP BY tSO.[id] ,tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSO.[crdate] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[name] AS [NodeUName] ,tSO.[object_id] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,CASE WHEN OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 1 THEN N'MSShippedTableIcon' WHEN tSO.[type_desc] IN (N'USER_TABLE') THEN N'UserTableIcon' WHEN tSO.[type_desc] IN (N'SYSTEM_TABLE') THEN N'SystemTableIcon' WHEN tSO.[type_desc] IN (N'INTERNAL_TABLE') THEN N'InternalTableIcon' ELSE N'UnknownTableIcon' END AS [NodeUIcon] ,N'#808080' AS [NodeFontColor] ,N'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSO.[object_id] AS [ObjectId] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] WHERE tSO.[type] = @XTypeId AND tSO.[schema_id] = @SchemaId GROUP BY tSO.[object_id] ,tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
